name: Mr.1 (Daz.Bonez)
text:
If there is a Character with a cost of 0 or a Character with a cost of 8 or more, this Character can attack Characters on the turn in which it is played.
On Play: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 0.

effect.text: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 0.
